心血管高解释https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/rss-feed/?feed_id=1vUePJ4Z_tESAAXKwJxBoGOTaabXd6U-NVu8003KrCpq8yLQC-&utm_source=Chrome&utm_campaign=pubmed-2&fc=20230708114047&v=2.18.0.post9+e462414&utm_medium=rss&utm_content=1vUePJ4Z_tESAAXKwJxBoGOTaabXd6U-NVu8003KrCpq8yLQC-&ff=20250323161122心血管高额外版：PubMed的最新结果 http://www.rssboard.org/rss-specification PubMed RSS提要（2.18.0.post9+E462414） en太阳，2025年3月23日20:11:23 +0000 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 06:00:00 -0400 120 在2015年至2023年之间，现实世界实践中冠状动脉管理决策的变化：最逃避/BSE-NSTEP观察性研究的见解https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40119705/？ 08114047＆ff = 20250323161122＆v = 2.18.0.post9+e462414结论：冠状动脉管理途径在英国发生了变化，中等缺血的患者正在接受冠状动脉血管造影，但是，冠状动脉干预率没有变化，表明压力超声心动图用于改善患者的侵入性程序，同时将未来的参考量减小。对患者有任何影响...

Eur J Cardiovasc成像。

抽象的

目的：评估更新的临床准则和文献对正在进行压力超声心动图的患者的管理的现实影响，以评估国家卫生服务范围内诱导性缺血。

方法和结果：在2015 - 2023年之间，共有32名英国医院的13,819名患者在两个阶段中分析了应力超声心动图：第1阶段（2015-2020）和第2阶段（2020-2023）（2020-2023）。性别分布在跨阶段保持相似。在正压力超声心动图之后，侵入性的血管造影量（p <0.01）似乎是归因于现代性缺血的患者的管理变化（3-4个段）中心的大多数证据执行更高量的应力超声心动图。

结论：冠状动脉管理途径在英国发生了变化，中等缺血的患者正在接受冠状动脉血管造影，但是，冠状动脉干预率没有变化，表明压力超声心动图用于改善患者的侵入性程序，同时将未来的参考量减小。是否对患者预后的任何影响。

PMID ： 40119705 |

但是，在绿色革命期间，半矮人的作物变化和肥料的产量促进了粮食和粮食安全。 “气候智能Crops" that improve yield and reduce negative impacts on the environment. Our proposed framework integrates plant genotype, root exudates, and microbes to optimize nutrient cycling, improve stress resilience, and expedite carbon sequestration. Integrating unselected ecological traits into crop breeding can promote agricultural sustainability, illuminating the next between plant genetics and ecosystem functioning.

Eur Heart J. 2025 3月21日：EHAF016。

抽象的

欧洲心脏病学社会（ESC）临床实践指南（CPG）的证据水平（CPG）对支持建议的证据的质量归类。委员会首先负责更新LOE评分系统以进行治疗和预防，并负责开发诊断和预测的LOE评分系统。 A代表了至少两个高质量研究的诊断能力的结论性证据B代表了一个高质量的证据或至少两个中等质量的研究。从至少一个或多个中等质量的外部验证研究中，有足够的预测能力在一个或多个派生研究中是暗示性的证据。但是，质量低或没有外部验证，或对低质量的推导研究。

EUR HEART J. 2025 3月21日：EHAF009。

抽象的

ESC临床实践指南的证据水平（LOE）的质量支持了建议的质量，目前的分类学并未完全考虑确定此类建议的最佳研究设计，因此，临床实践指南委员会任命了两个独立的临床专家。治疗和预防的评分系统，第二个负责诊断和预测的LOE等级系统。荟萃分析（例如，用于优势的p <.005）。在非劣质性，等效性和危害的情况下，定义了大量证据，以示例B1和B1的差异，这是≥1的频率，或者是A的差异。 （例如，p <.05的优势水平）B2有限的证据有限，有限的非随机研究，仔细控制了主要的偏见来源，或者是对较小的，能力不足的RCT的荟萃分析。

PMID： 40116016 |

; PubMed：40116016 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 06:00:00 -0400马克·贝尔金詹妮弗（Jennifer）是一个牛仔Marat Fudim瑞安·J·特德福德（Ryan J Tedford）乔纳森·格林斯坦（Jonathan Grinstein） 2025-03-21循环复兴天鹅：介绍芝加哥血液动力学论坛PMID：40116016 doi：10.1161/circheartfailure.124.012725 3D超声心动图和CMR成像，用于评估右心室功能和三尖瓣反流严重程度https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40116010/?utm_source=Chrome&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=pubmed-2&utm_content=1vUePJ4Z_tESAAXKwJxBoGOTaabXd6U-NVu8003KrCpq8yLQC-&fc=20230708114047&ff=20250323161122&v=2.18.0.post9+e462414结论：3DE提供了与CMR相当的TR严重性的准确评估。

CIRC CARDIOVASC成像。

抽象的

背景：Tricuspid反流（TR）与死亡率增加有关，并且由于成像方式的限制而经常被诊断，而常规的二维超声心动图（2DE）则经常与心脏磁共振成像（CMR）的分类相关，但在跨性别范围中均未分类。跨成像的方案因此，这项研究提供了所有3个成像模式（2DE，3DE和CMR）的模式比较，以评估TR的严重性，并提出使用CMR进行适应的5级分级方案。

方法：在2个队列中分析了144例症状性TR：来自慕尼黑大学医院的派生队列（n = 91），并从心脏中心进行验证（n = 53）。 Ated。

结果：在派生队列中（中位年龄为66％），TR严重性高度与CMR高度相关（在1年级差异内有87％的一致性），与2DE相比，与CMR相比，相当于cmr的2DE（68％）与CMR相比，准确率最低（34.5％; p = 0.005）频繁地高估了TR的严重性与CMR相比，与2DE相比， TR的严重程度显着频繁（21％vers 56％； P <0.001） ATED，显示出可比的结果在派生和验证队列中。

结论：3DE提供了与CMR相当的TR严重性的准确评估。

PMID： 40116010 |

; PubMed：40116010 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 06:00:00 -0400 Philipp M Doldi路德维希·韦克巴赫尼古拉·芬克（Nicola Fink）卢卡斯·斯托尔兹（Lukas Stolz） Cecilia ennin朱利安·丁克尔（Julien Dinkel）菲利普·卢兹（Philipp Lurz） Holger Thiele丽贝卡·哈恩（Rebecca Hahn） JoãoLCavalcante克里斯蒂安·贝斯勒（Christian Besler）约尔格·豪斯莱特（JörgHausleiter） 2025-03-21循环3D超声心动图和CMR成像，用于评估右心室功能和三尖瓣反流严重程度PMID：40116010 doi：10.1161/cimimaging.124.017638 矛盾的低流量，低梯度严重主动脉狭窄的严重二尖瓣反流https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40116009/?utm_source=Chrome&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=pubmed-2&utm_content=1vUePJ4Z_tESAAXKwJxBoGOTaabXd6U-NVu8003KrCpq8yLQC-&fc=20230708114047&ff=20250323161122&v=2.18.0.post9+e462414结论：低梯度，低梯度的严重主动脉狭窄与不良后果和独特的左心室重塑有关，主动脉瓣替换会改善所有MR等级的生存，在严重MR中的影响更大。

Circ Cardiovasc Imaging。

抽象的

背景：矛盾的低梯度狭窄的患者暴露于低骨流量（Q），同时保持左心室射血分数（MR）的左心室射血分数（MR）也会导致低流动性的诊断和管理重点。

方法：来自机构回波数据库的数据确定了1189例调整后的主动脉瓣狭窄（主动脉瓣面积≤1.0cm 2 ），较低的跨积极梯度（平均梯度<40 mm Hg），保留了左心室偏射分数（≥50％），并确认了较低的速率（Q;亚组基于MR严重程度（严重和非严重性）。临床结果包括全因死亡率，主动脉瓣置换，心力衰竭住院和综合结果。

结果：在严重的MR组中，患者的流量较低，左心室尺寸增加，而偏心肥大的模式与Nonevere MR相比（ n = 1109）（ n = 1109）。死亡率风险（危险比率为1.43； p = 0.011）和综合结果（危险比，1.64； p < 0.001 ）显着降低了每个MR度的死亡率。 。

结论：低梯度，低梯度的严重主动脉狭窄与不良后果和独特的左心室重塑有关，主动脉瓣替换会改善所有MR等级的生存，在严重MR中的影响更大。

PMID： 40116009 |

; PubMed：40116009 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 06:00:00 -0400 Shani Dahan雅各布·达尔·比安科（Jacob Dal-Bianco） Ygal Plakht Mayoran Namasivayam Romain Capoulade新Zeng Jonathan J Passeri Evin Yucel迈克尔·皮卡德（Michael H Picard）罗伯特·莱文（Robert A Levine）朱迪吊死2025-03-21循环矛盾的低流量，低梯度严重主动脉狭窄的严重二尖瓣反流PMID：40116009 doi：10.1161/cimimaging.124.017598 心绞痛和非刺激性冠状动脉患者心外膜冠状动脉痉挛的CT预测指标https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40116006/?utm_source=Chrome&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=pubmed-2&utm_content=1vUePJ4Z_tESAAXKwJxBoGOTaabXd6U-NVu8003KrCpq8yLQC-&fc=20230708114047&ff=20250323161122&v=2.18.0.post9+e462414结论：对于非冠状动脉冠状动脉的患者，使用CCTA进行非侵入性综合评估的预痉挛挑衅测试可能有助于识别患有VSA高风险的人。

CIRC CARDIOVASC成像。

抽象的

BACKGROUND: Recent studies have shown that vasospastic angina (VSA) is associated with myocardial bridge (MB) and pericoronary adipose tissue inflammation. We aimed to investigate the clinical and coronary computed tomography angiographic (CCTA) features that could predict VSA in patients with angina and nonobstructive coronary arteries.

METHODS: We retrospectively studied patients with nonobstructive coronary arteries who underwent a spasm provocation test and CCTA within 3 months before the spasm provocation test. Pericoronary adipose tissue inflammation was evaluated using the fat attenuation index (FAI) of the proximal reference diameter and the inner 2 mm adipose tissue layer (FAI 2mm ) from the vessel wall. Coronary plaques were qualitatively classified as noncalcified or calcified plaques in each vessel. In addition, MB was evaluated in the left descending artery.

RESULTS: This study included 142 patients, with 55 (38.7%) diagnosed with VSA. Factors associated with VSA included male sex (74.5% versus 51.7%, P =0.01), smoking history (70.9% versus 52.9%, P =0.05), CCTA-defined MB (49.1% versus 28.7%, P =0.02), and FAI, especially FAI 2mm in the right coronary artery-FAI 2mm (-68.8 Hounsfield unit versus -74.0 Hounsfield unit, P <0.01), as well as the presence of CCTA-defined mixed or noncalcified plaque anywhere in the coronary tree (65.5% versus 39.1%, P <0.01). In a multivariable analysis, CCTA-defined MB (odds ratio, 2.23 [95% CI, 1.03-4.83]; P =0.04), right coronary artery-FAI 2mm (odds ratio, 1.07 [95% CI, 1.02-1.12]; P <0.01), and the presence of mixed or noncalcified plaque (odds ratio, 3.15 [95% CI, 1.45-6.80]; P <0.01) were independently associated with VSA. A combination of CCTA-defined MB in the left descending artery, high right coronary artery-FAI 2mm (≥-72.6 Hounsfield unit, median), and CCTA-defined mixed or noncalcified plaque in the coronary tree predicted VSA with a 75.0% probability, while the absence of all 3 factors precluded VSA with 95.6% probability.

CONCLUSIONS: For patients with nonobstructive coronary arteries, a prespasm provocation test using a noninvasive comprehensive assessment with CCTA may help identify those at high risk for VSA.

PMID: 40116006 | DOI: 10.1161/CIRCIMAGING.124.017565

; pubmed:40116006 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 06:00:00 -0400 Takashi Mineo Eisuke Usui Yoshihisa Kanaji Masahiro Hada Tatsuhiro Nagamine Hiroki Ueno Kai Nogami Mirei Setoguchi Tomohiro Tahara Tatsuya Sakamoto Masahiro Hoshino Tomoyo Sugiyama Taishi Yonetsu Tetsuo Sasano Tsunekazu Kakuta 2025-03-21 Circulation. Cardiovascular imaging CT Predictors of Epicardial Coronary Spasm in Patients With Angina and Nonobstructive Coronary Arteries pmid:40116006 doi:10.1161/CIRCIMAGING.124.017565 MRI-Extracellular Volume Fraction Versus Histological Amyloid Load in Cardiac Amyloidosis: The Importance of T2 Mapping https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40116000/?utm_source=Chrome&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=pubmed-2&utm_content=1vUePJ4Z_tESAAXKwJxBoGOTaabXd6U-NVu8003KrCpq8yLQC-&fc=20230708114047&ff=20250323161122&v=2.18.0.post9+e462414 CONCLUSIONS: In patients with ATTRwt-CM and prolonged T2, MRI-ECV did not accurately reflect histological amyloid load. Our findings underscore the need for a multiparametric imaging approach, combining both ECV and T2 mapping, to better characterize myocardial tissue in patients with ATTRwt-CM, and further prospective research in larger and more diverse cohorts is needed to validate our results.

Circ Cardiovasc Imaging. 2025 Mar 21:e017427. doi: 10.1161/CIRCIMAGING.124.017427. Online ahead of print.

抽象的

BACKGROUND: MRI-derived myocardial extracellular volume fraction (ECV) is elevated in the presence of fibrosis, amyloid deposition, inflammation and edema. In patients with cardiac amyloidosis and prolonged T2 due to concomitant inflammation or edema, MRI-ECV may not correctly reflect histological amyloid load. The authors sought to determine whether MRI-ECV can accurately reflect histological amyloid load in 2 groups of patients with wild-type transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy (ATTRwt-CM), with and without T2 prolongation.

METHODS: This retrospective study included consecutive patients with ATTRwt-CM who underwent endomyocardial biopsy and cardiac MRI from March 2017 to October 2021 for initial evaluation of ATTRwt-CM. We measured MRI-ECV and T2, and evaluated correlation between MRI-ECV and amyloid load from endomyocardial biopsy by means of Pearson correlation analysis.

RESULTS: Of 44 patients (mean age, 75±6 years [SD]; 40 men), 24 showed T2 prolongation (T2≥50 milliseconds). All specimens obtained by endomyocardial biopsy were suitable for analysis. The interval between endomyocardial biopsy and cardiac MRI examination was a median of 3 days (interquartile range, 2-4). In the absence of T2 prolongation due to increased water content, MRI-ECV and amyloid load showed a moderately significant correlation (Spearman ρ=0.50, P =0.03). However, in the presence of T2 prolongation, there was no significant correlation between MRI-ECV and amyloid load (Spearman ρ=-0.05, P =0.83).

CONCLUSIONS: In patients with ATTRwt-CM and prolonged T2, MRI-ECV did not accurately reflect histological amyloid load. Our findings underscore the need for a multiparametric imaging approach, combining both ECV and T2 mapping, to better characterize myocardial tissue in patients with ATTRwt-CM, and further prospective research in larger and more diverse cohorts is needed to validate our results.

Genomic and precision medicine Performance of AlphaMissense and Other In Silico Predictors to Determine Pathogenicity of Missense Variants in Sarcomeric Genes pmid:40115995 doi:10.1161/CIRCGEN.124.004922 National Organ Procurement and Transplant Network Heart Allocation Policy: 6 Years Later https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40115988/?utm_source=Chrome&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=pubmed-2&utm_content=1vUePJ4Z_tESAAXKwJxBoGOTaabXd6U-NVu8003KrCpq8yLQC-&fc=20230708114047&ff=20250323161122&v=2.18.0.post9+e462414 In 2014, the Organ Procurement and Transplant Network began reappraisal of the United States heart transplant allocation policy. Driven by ongoing discordance between organ supply and demand, high waitlist mortality, and increasing exception requests, the Thoracic Committee radically redesigned the priority scheme and drafted a 6-tiered algorithm, included durable device complications into policy, expanded broader sharing, and increased the number of mandatory listing variables to develop a...

Circ Heart Fail. 2025 Mar 21:e011631. doi: 10.1161/CIRCHEARTFAILURE.124.011631. Online ahead of print.

抽象的

In 2014, the Organ Procurement and Transplant Network began reappraisal of the United States heart transplant allocation policy. Driven by ongoing discordance between organ supply and demand, high waitlist mortality, and increasing exception requests, the Thoracic Committee radically redesigned the priority scheme and drafted a 6-tiered algorithm, included durable device complications into policy, expanded broader sharing, and increased the number of mandatory listing variables to develop a future heart allocation score. This became the 2018 New Heart Allocation Policy. Changes in allocation priority have resulted in a significant increase in the use of temporary mechanical circulatory support in waitlisted candidates with a concomitant decrease in the number of patients bridged to transplanted with durable left ventricular assist device support. The number of exception requests continues to increase, particularly for patients listed status 2 and for multiorgan transplants. Importantly, fewer patients are being delisted for clinical improvement, suggesting missed opportunities for recovery. The current review will critically evaluate the 2018 heart allocation policy 6 years later, briefly focusing on the history of heart allocation in the United States, the current and evolving algorithms for candidate prioritization including continuous distribution, the impact of technology and innovation on transplant rates and future policy development, and the ongoing regulatory oversight and governance changes in the Organ Procurement and Transplant Network.

PMID: 40115988 | DOI: 10.1161/CIRCHEARTFAILURE.124.011631

; pubmed:40115988 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 06:00:00 -0400 Lauren K Truby Liviu Klein Jane E Wilcox Maryjane Farr 2025-03-21 Circulation. Heart failure National Organ Procurement and Transplant Network Heart Allocation Policy: 6 Years Later pmid:40115988 doi:10.1161/CIRCHEARTFAILURE.124.011631
